info.title: Info about record
info.description: Because site is currently in offline mode, record was updated only locally, it will be updated on the servers when internet connection will be established.

info.description: Because site is currently in offline mode, record was added only locally, it will be saved on the servers when internet connection will be established.

delete.title: Are you absolutely sure?
delete.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your record and remove this data from our servers.
